explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a pair of gloved hands picking up a tube of hair conditioner in yellow packaging.

[0-3] The gloved hands open the cap of the conditioner, revealing yellow cream. The gloved hands squeeze the yellow cream into a white bowl. The scene switches to a woman in a white sweater sitting in front of a wooden table. She reaches out with both hands wearing gloves covered in yellow cream, puts her hands together as if counting to ten, and then reaches towards a white cat sitting on the floor.
